casebody.data:
Mary E. Post, as executrix, &c., respondent, v. William B. Dinsmore, as president, &c., appellant. Decided June 1, 1885. Appeal by defendant from a judgment in favor of the plaintiff entered upon the verdict of a jury, and from an order denying defendant’s motion on the minutes for a new trial. Charles M. Da *562Costa and William D. Guthrie, for appellant. Baldwin & Blackmar, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Opinion by Freedman, J.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
